message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I believe a price of $14,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
I understand you have a budget, Bob, but $12,500 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,250?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I can only go up to $13,000. Can we meet at this price?
